article_text:
Centerville, IA (52544)

Today

Partly cloudy this morning with thunderstorms becoming likely this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 82F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. Low 63F. NNE winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Rick Jensen

og.description: It’s broken promises that have earned both Jeb Bush and Lindsay Graham a lack of respect from Republican voters.
og.title: Broken promises flood election season
